DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine neurologic cognitive effect play tackle football grade school high school . During contact practice game , player wear football helmet contain impact sensor . Before season , player complete neurological testing measure several different aspect brain function . Two group football player study : 5th 6th grade tackle football player Brighton Bulldogs Football Cheer league ( 70 player ) . Varsity football player Brighton High School ( 70 player per year ) . The study begin July 2016 continue 4 year ( winter 2020 ) .

DOC.detailed_description: Football player wear football helmet contain InSite Impact Response System measure , hard , helmet hit . Coaches ( athletic trainer ) notify threshold impact via sideline handheld device . Each year pre post-season , subject complete several test brain function clinic visit . These test list `` secondary outcome '' section . Specific Aims : 1 . To quantify cumulative head impact burden consecutive season youth tackle football high school football . 2 . To detect impairment neurologic cognitive function play youth tackle football high school football . 3 . To use cumulative head impact burden predict development neurologic neurocognitive impairment . 4 . To compare effect head impact youth tackle football player verse high school football player .
